import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, } from 'react-bootstrap' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) return (

{product.name}

Price:€{product.price}

Description:{product.description}

Price: €{product.price} Status: {product.status} Go Back
) } export default ProductScreen
